name: AiMentor Elementor
author: AiMentor

sections.description: AiMentor Elementor delivers one-click, prompt-driven page generation with support for both AiMentor and legacy JagGrok API providers. Upgrade to keep receiving model improvements across OpenAI, Grok, and future multi-provider releases.
sections.installation: Upload the ZIP via WordPress > Plugins > Add New and activate AiMentor Elementor. Existing JagGrok customers can install over the topâ€”the plugin automatically migrates settings and provider credentials.
sections.changelog:
= 1.4.3 =
* Re-branded update channel for AiMentor Elementor.
* Introduced multi-provider provisioning guidance for customers migrating from JagGrok builds.
* Bundled latest compatibility fixes for WordPress 6.4 and Elementor 3.18.

upgrade_notice: AiMentor Elementor replaces JagGrok Elementor. Install this build to continue receiving provider updates across OpenAI, Grok, and future partners.
